translation.en: People disappear all the time.
Young girls run away from home.
translation.es: Jóvenes que huyen de sus casas.

translation.en: Children stray from their parents and are never seen again.
translation.es: Niños que se alejan de sus padres y nunca son encontrados.

translation.en: Housewives take the grocery money and a taxi to the train station.
translation.es: Amas de casa con el dinero de las compras, que se toman un taxi a la estación.

translation.en: Most are found, eventually.
translation.es: Finalmente, a la mayoría los encuentran.

translation.en: Disappearances, after all, have explanations.
translation.es: Después de todo, las desapariciones tienen una explicación.

translation.en: Usually.
Strange, the things you remember.
translation.es: Es raro las cosas que uno recuerda.

translation.en: Single images and feelings that stay with you down through the years.
translation.es: Imágenes y sentimientos que nos acompañan durante años.

translation.en: Like the moment I'd realized, I'd never owned a vase.
translation.es: TIENDA DE RAMOS GENERALES FARRELLS Como el momento en que me di cuenta de que nunca había tenido un florero.

translation.en: That I'd never lived in any place long enough
translation.es: Que nunca había vivido en ninguna parte

translation.en: to justify having such a simple thing.
translation.es: tiempo suficiente para tener algo tan simple.

translation.en: And how at that moment,
I wanted nothing so much in all the world as to have a vase of my very own.
translation.es: no deseaba nada en el mundo tanto como tener un florero que fuese mío.

translation.en: It was a Tuesday afternoon,
six months after the end of the war.
translation.es: seis meses después del final de la guerra.

translation.en: Oh, God!
Hold him.
Hold him right now! You hear me?
Jesus Christ!
You're going home, right?
Here, quickly!
Doctor, doctor!
Oh, God!
I'll have to clamp the femoral artery before he bleeds out!
translation.es: ¡Sujetaré la arteria femoral antes de que se desangre!

translation.en: It's all right, Jackie boy. You're going home, mate. You're going home.
translation.es: Está bien, Jackie. Irás a casa, amigo.

translation.en: Oh, my God!
Jesus!
Move.
We've got him now, nurse.
Scalpel!
Claire! Did you hear? It's over!
It's really, finally over!
Hi!
Somehow, in my mind, V-E Day,
translation.es: De alguna forma, en mi mente, el Día de la Victoria,

translation.en: the end of the bloodiest and most terrible war in human history,
translation.es: el final de la guerra más sangrienta y terrible de la historia de la humanidad,

translation.en: grows fainter with each passing day.
translation.es: se desvanece con cada día que pasa.

translation.en: But I can still recall every detail of the day,
translation.es: Pero aún puedo recordar cada detalle del día

translation.en: when I saw the life I wanted sitting in a window.
translation.es: en que vi la vida que quería, allí en una vidriera.

translation.en: I sometimes wonder what would have happened
translation.es: A veces me pregunto qué hubiese pasado

translation.en: if I'd bought that vase and made a home for it.
translation.es: si hubiera comprado ese florero y le hubiera dado un hogar.

translation.en: Would that have changed things?
Would I have been happy?
Who can say?
I do know this.
Even now, after all the pain and death
translation.es: Incluso ahora, después de todo el dolor, la muerte,

translation.en: and heartbreak that followed,
translation.es: y el sufrimiento que vinieron después,

translation.en: I still would make the same choice.
We were in Scotland on our second honeymoon.
translation.es: Estábamos en Escocia en nuestra segunda luna de miel.

translation.en: Or at least that's what Frank called it.
translation.es: O al menos así la llamaba Frank.

translation.en: A way to celebrate the end of the war years and begin our lives anew.
translation.es: Una forma de celebrar el final de la guerra y de recomenzar nuestras vidas.

translation.en: But it was more than that.
I think we both felt a holiday would be a convenient masquerade
translation.es: Creo que sentíamos que unas vacaciones serían una farsa conveniente

translation.en: for the real business of getting to know the people we'd become
translation.es: para el motivo real de conocer a las personas en que nos habíamos convertido

translation.en: after five years apart.
-What do you suppose that is? -Huh?
Oh, good Lord. Blood.
Are you sure?
I think I should know the look of blood by now.
translation.es: Creo que a esta altura debo saber cómo se ve la sangre.

translation.en: There's a stain just like it on the house next door.
translation.es: Hay una mancha allí igual a la de la casa vecina.

translation.en: There's two more over there.
We seem to be surrounded by homes marked with blood.
translation.es: Parece que estamos rodeados por casas marcadas con sangre.

translation.en: Perhaps Pharaoh has refused Moses,
translation.es: Tal vez el Faraón ha rechazado a Moisés.

translation.en: and the spirit of death will travel the streets of Inverness tonight,
translation.es: El espíritu de la muerte recorrerá las calles de Inverness esta noche,

translation.en: sparing only those who mark their doors with lamb's blood.
translation.es: y perdonará las casas marcadas con la sangre de cordero.

translation.en: You may be closer than you think.
translation.es: Podrías estar más acertada de lo que crees.

translation.en: Could well be some sort of sacrificial ritual,
translation.es: Podría ser algún tipo de sacrificio ritual,

translation.en: but I suspect pagan rather than Hebrew.
translation.es: pero sospecho que pagano, más que hebreo.

translation.en: I had no idea Inverness was such a hotbed of contemporary paganism.
translation.es: No sabía que Inverness era un hervidero de paganismo contemporáneo.

translation.en: Well, my dear, there's no place on earth
translation.es: Querida, no hay lugar en la Tierra

translation.en: with more magic and superstition mixed into its daily life
translation.es: con más magia y supersticiones en la vida diaria

translation.en: than the Scottish Highlands.
Shall we?
translation.es: Alojamiento y desayuno de la Sra. Baird ¿Entramos?

translation.en: Lead on.
The blood you saw is that of a black cockerel.
translation.es: La sangre que vieron es de un gallo negro joven.

translation.en: It's an old custom at this time of year
translation.es: Es una vieja costumbre, en esta época del año,

translation.en: to make such a sacrifice to honor Saint Odhran.
translation.es: hacer ese sacrificio en honor de San Odhran.

translation.en: Odhran, he was sainted in the eighth century?
translation.es: ¿Fue santificado en el siglo VIII, verdad?

translation.en: You know yer history.
I'm afraid my husband is a historian, Mrs. Baird.
translation.es: Mi esposo es historiador, Sra. Baird.

translation.en: He'd quite happily stand here holding forth for hours
translation.es: Seguirá hablándole de esto durante horas

translation.en: if you encourage him.
Hardly.
Highland folklore is far from my specialty, but am I right in thinking there's an...
translation.es: El folklore de las Tierras Altas no es mi especialidad, aunque creo que hay un...

translation.en: Is there an old saying associated with Saint Odhran?
translation.es: ¿Hay un viejo refrán asociado con San Odhran?

translation.en: Yes. "The Earth went over Odhran's eyes."
translation.es: Sí. "La Tierra se posó sobre los ojos de Odhran".

translation.en: He was buried alive voluntarily.
translation.es: Fue enterrado vivo por su propia voluntad.

translation.en: Charming.
Are ye a professor then, Mr. Randall?
I will be soon.
He's accepted a post at Oxford beginning in two weeks.
translation.es: Ha aceptado un puesto en Oxford, comenzará en dos semanas.

translation.en: Then this is a last holiday
translation.es: Entonces estas son las últimas vacaciones

translation.en: before settling down to a workaday life again, is it?
translation.es: antes de volver a la vida normal, ¿verdad?

translation.en: Well, you've picked a bonnie time to be here, just nigh on Samhain.
translation.es: Eligieron un buen momento para estar aquí, justo la noche de Samhain.

translation.en: I take it that's Gaelic for Halloween?
Well, Halloween is derived from Samhain.
The Church often took pagan holidays and renamed them for their own purposes.
translation.es: La Iglesia tomó las fiestas paganas y les cambió el nombre para sus propósitos.

translation.en: Samhain became Halloween,
Yule became Christmas, and so on...
translation.es: Yule se convirtió en Navidad, y así.

translation.en: Well, you're both welcome at the festival, of course.
translation.es: Por supuesto, ambos serán bienvenidos al festival.

translation.en: Mind you, ghosts are freed on the feast days,
translation.es: Tengan cuidado, los fantasmas se liberan en los días festivos

translation.en: and they'll be wandering about,
free to do good or ill as they please.
translation.es: para hacer el bien o el mal, según deseen.

translation.en: Of course. What would Halloween...
Samhain be without a good ghost story?
translation.es: Samhain, sin una buena historia de fantasmas.

translation.en: And we have those for sure.
I'll show you to your room.
Before the war, we were inseparable.
translation.es: Antes de la guerra, éramos inseparables.

translation.en: But for the next five years, we saw each other a grand total of 10 days.
translation.es: Pero en los siguientes cinco años nos vimos un total de diez días.

translation.en: It's not without its charms.
Beats an army tent and a cot in the mud.
translation.es: Mejor que una tienda del ejército y un catre en el barro.

translation.en: Indeed.
When the war ended,
we both thought things would return to the way they once were,
translation.es: pensamos que las cosas volverían a ser como antes,

translation.en: but they hadn't.
Gosh!
So much for marital privacy.
Do you think the sound carries?
Well, I think it's fair to say
Mrs. Baird will be kept apprised of any renewed attempt to start a family.
translation.es: que la Sra. Baird se enterará si intentamos comenzar una familia.

translation.en: Lazybones.
You'll never manage the next branch on your family tree
translation.es: No agregarás una rama al árbol familiar

translation.en: if you don't show more industry than that.
translation.es: si no te esfuerzas un poco más.

translation.en: Really?
What are you doing?
-Come on. -Mrs. Randall,
what am I to do with you?
Right.
What are you doing? You're gonna break the bed.
translation.es: ¿Qué haces? Vas a romper la cama.

translation.en: You know, one of those things
I used to try and remember lying in my cot,
translation.es: que trataba de recordar cuando estaba en mi catre,

translation.en: was the sound of my husband's laugh.
translation.es: era el sonido de la risa de mi esposo.

translation.en: I couldn't conjure it no matter what I did.
translation.es: No podía recordarla, sin importar qué hiciera.

translation.en: I couldn't hear it even though I'd heard it a million times before.
translation.es: No podía oírla, aunque la hubiera oído un millón de veces antes.

translation.en: -It's the strangest thing. -I know.
I used to...
I used to sketch this.
-My hand? -Well...
The lines, really.
Why exactly, I'm not sure,
translation.es: No estoy seguro del por qué,

translation.en: but I had a very clear memory of this... This pattern.
translation.es: pero recordaba claramente esto... Este patrón.

translation.en: Made little doodles everywhere.
There was...
A brigadier once dressed me down
translation.es: Una vez, un brigadier me regañó

translation.en: because I drew it in the margin of a report for the minister.
translation.es: porque lo dibujé en el margen de un informe para el ministro.

translation.en: Yeah.
Happy?
Yes.
Frank's passion for history
translation.es: La pasión de Frank por la historia

translation.en: was another reason for choosing the Highlands.
translation.es: era otra razón para elegir las Tierras Altas.

translation.en: You see up there?
The top there, that's Cocknammon Rock.
translation.es: Lo de arriba es la Roca de Cocknammon.

translation.en: And in the 17th and 18th centuries,
translation.es: En los siglos XVII y XVIII,

translation.en: you'd have often found a British Army patrol up there
translation.es: allí se encontraba una patrulla del Ejército Británico

translation.en: lying in wait for Scottish rebels and brigands.
translation.es: esperando a los rebeldes y bandoleros escoceses.

translation.en: Can you see how it commands the high ground in every direction?
translation.es: ¿Puedes ver cómo domina las tierras en todas las direcciones?

translation.en: It was a perfect position for an ambush.
translation.es: Era la posición perfecta para una emboscada.

translation.en: Not that I minded.
I was raised by my uncle after the death of my parents.
translation.es: Después de la muerte de mis padres, me crio mi tío.

translation.en: Uncle Lamb was an archeologist,
so, I'd spent the balance of my formative years
translation.es: así que pasé mis años de formación

translation.en: traipsing through dusty ruins
and various excavations throughout the world.
translation.es: y excavaciones de todo el mundo.

translation.en: I'd learned to dig latrines and boil water,
translation.es: Aprendí a cavar letrinas, a hervir agua,

translation.en: and to do a number of other things not suitable for a young lady of gentle birth.
translation.es: y a hacer muchas cosas inadecuadas para una joven de buena cuna.

translation.en: -Uncle? -Yes.
The very thought.
Frank's new-found passion was genealogy.
translation.es: La nueva pasión de Frank era la genealogía.

translation.en: His personal genealogy, that is.
Mine was botany.
I'd developed a keen interest
in the use of plants and herbs for medicinal purposes.
translation.es: en el uso de plantas y hierbas con fines medicinales.

translation.en: So, from what I can gather,
Castle Leoch was the ancestral home
translation.es: el Castillo Leoch era el hogar ancestral

translation.en: of the Laird of the MacKenzie clan
translation.es: del clan del Señor de MacKenzie

translation.en: until midway through the 19th century.
Here, take a look.
In a way, burying himself in the distant past
translation.es: En cierta forma, hundirse en su pasado remoto

translation.en: gave Frank an ability to escape the recent.
translation.es: le daba a Frank la posibilidad de escapar del reciente.

translation.en: While I was in the army, Frank had served in London.
translation.es: Mientras yo estuve en el ejército, Frank sirvió en Londres.

translation.en: Intelligence, overseeing spies
and running covert operations.
So, I think this might have been the kitchen.
translation.es: Creo que esta debe haber sido la cocina.

translation.en: Really?
I would say that's probably a hearth.
translation.es: Diría que ese es un fogón.

translation.en: Yeah.
Strange.
I have no evidence that my ancestor visited this castle,
translation.es: No tengo pruebas de que mi antepasado visitara este castillo,

translation.en: but it was within his operational sphere.
translation.es: pero estaba dentro de su esfera de operaciones.

translation.en: So, it is just possible that he walked these very halls.
translation.es: Es posible que caminara por estas mismas habitaciones.

translation.en: He'd sent dozens of men behind the lines on secret missions,
translation.es: Había enviado a docenas de hombres detrás de las líneas, en misiones secretas,

translation.en: and most never came back.
He didn't talk about it very often,
translation.es: No hablaba de ello a menudo,

translation.en: but I knew it preyed on him.
It won't open.
Come on.
Three, two, one...
What do you think this was used for?
From the lack of proper lighting and ventilation,
translation.es: Por la falta de iluminación y de ventilación,

translation.en: I would say province of the castle hermit.
translation.es: diría que eran los aposentos del ermitaño del castillo.

translation.en: Or perhaps a troll or two.
translation.es: O tal vez de un gnomo o dos.

translation.en: I don't think trolls live in pairs.
translation.es: Creo que los gnomos no viven en pareja.

translation.en: Solitary creatures, they.
It's a pity.
All this,
and no one to share it with.
You'll get dirty.
You can give me a bath.
Why, Mrs. Randall,
I do believe you've left your undergarments at home.
translation.es: creo que se ha dejado la ropa interior en casa.

translation.en: Yes! Yes, yes, yes.
-I found him. -Indeed.
Let us have a look.
Him? Is it Walter?
No, darling, Jonathan. Jonathan Wolverton Randall. Finally.
translation.es: No, querida, Jonathan. Jonathan Wolverton Randall. Finalmente.

translation.en: Captain of dragoons in the British army,
translation.es: Capitán de los Dragones del Ejército Británico,

translation.en: and your direct ancestor.
Exactly.
Otherwise known as "Black Jack."
A rather dashing nickname
that he probably acquired while he was stationed here in the 1740s.
translation.es: que debe haber adquirido cuando estuvo aquí en 1740.

translation.en: The Reverend has found a series of army dispatches
translation.es: El Reverendo encontró unos despachos del ejército

translation.en: -that mention the Captain by name. -How exciting.
translation.es: -que mencionan al Capitán por su nombre. -Emocionante.

translation.en: It is.
Good to see all your sleuthing over the past week has paid off.
translation.es: Qué bueno que tu investigación haya dado frutos.

translation.en: Yes, I was beginning to wonder.
It appears Black Jack commanded the garrison
translation.es: Parece que Jack Black comandó la guarnición

translation.en: at Fort William for four years or so.
translation.es: de Fort William unos cuatro años.

translation.en: Seems to have spent quite a bit of his time
harassing the Scottish countryside
on behalf of the Crown.
Well, he was hardly alone in that endeavor.
translation.es: Seguramente no estuvo solo en esa tarea.

translation.en: The English were deeply unpopular
throughout the Highlands in the 18th century.
translation.es: en las Tierras Altas en el siglo XVIII.

translation.en: And well into the 20th, it would seem.
I distinctly heard the barman at that pub last night
translation.es: Escuché claramente al cantinero del pub anoche,

translation.en: refer to us as "Sassenachs."
I hope you didn't take offense.
translation.es: Espero que no lo tomen como ofensa.

translation.en: It only means "Englishman," after all,
or at worst, "Outlander."
I've brought you a wee bit of refreshment, gentlemen.
I've brought but the two cups,
for I thought perhaps Mrs. Randall might care to join me in the kitchen...
translation.es: pensé que quizás la Sra. Randall prefiera venir conmigo a la cocina...

translation.en: Yes. Yes, absolutely. Thank you.
See you later.
This person here...
It's been so long since I've had a good cup of oolong.
translation.es: Hace mucho tiempo que no bebo una buena taza de oolong.

translation.en: Aye, I couldn't get it during the war.
translation.es: Sí, no pude conseguirlo durante la guerra.

translation.en: It's the best for the readings, though.
translation.es: Es el mejor para leer la fortuna.

translation.en: I had a terrible time with that Earl Grey.
translation.es: La pasé terrible con ese Earl Grey.

translation.en: The leaves fall apart so fast, it's hard to tell anything at all.
translation.es: Las hojas se rompen tan rápido que es difícil poder decir algo.

translation.en: So, you read tea leaves, then?
Like my grandmother taught me.
And her grandmother before that.
Drink up your cup. Let's see what we've got there.
translation.es: Beba su taza. Veamos qué tenemos ahí.

translation.en: Well, am I going to meet a tall, dark stranger and take a trip across the sea?
translation.es: ¿Voy a conocer a un extraño alto y moreno y haré un viaje por el mar?

translation.en: Could be.
Or could not.
Everything in it is contradictory.
There's a curved leaf, which indicates a journey,
translation.es: Hay una hoja curva, que indica un viaje,

translation.en: but it's crossed by a broken one,
translation.es: pero está cruzada por una hoja rota,

translation.en: which means staying put.
translation.es: que significa que se quedará donde está.

translation.en: And there are strangers there, to be sure, several of them.
translation.es: Hay extraños allí, por cierto, varios de ellos.

translation.en: And one of them's your husband, if I read the leaves all right.
translation.es: Uno de ellos es su esposo, si leo bien las hojas.

translation.en: Show me your hand, dear.
Odd.
Most hands have a likeness to them.
translation.es: La mayoría de las manos tienen similitudes.

translation.en: There are patterns, you know?
But this is a pattern I've not seen before.
translation.es: Pero este es un patrón que nunca he visto.

translation.en: The large thumb, now.
It means that you're strong-minded, and you have a will not easily crossed.
translation.es: Significa que usted es decidida, y su voluntad no se tuerce fácilmente.

translation.en: And this is your Mount of Venus.
translation.es: Y este es su monte de Venus.

translation.en: In a man, it means he likes the lasses,
translation.es: En un hombre, significa que le gustan las chicas,

translation.en: but it is a bit different for a woman.
translation.es: pero en las mujeres es diferente.

translation.en: To be polite about it,
your husband is not likely to stray far from your bed.
translation.es: no es probable que su esposo se aparte mucho de su cama.

translation.en: The lifeline's interrupted,
translation.es: La línea de la vida está interrumpida,

translation.en: all bits and pieces.
The marriage line's divided. Means two marriages.
translation.es: La línea del matrimonio está dividida. Significa dos matrimonios.

translation.en: But...
Most divided lines are broken.
translation.es: La mayoría de las líneas divididas están interrumpidas.

translation.en: Yours is...
Forked.
But I suspect your ancestor had a patron.
translation.es: Sospecho que su antepasado tenía un mecenas.

translation.en: A prominent and powerful man
who could protect him from the censure of his superiors.
translation.es: que lo protegía de la censura de sus superiores.

translation.en: Possibly, but it would have to have been someone
translation.es: Es posible, pero debió ser alguien

translation.en: very high up in the hierarchy of the day
translation.es: que estaba muy alto en la jerarquía

translation.en: to exert that kind of influence.
translation.es: para ejercer ese tipo de influencia.

translation.en: The Duke of Sandringham.
The Duke of Sandringham?
Hold on.
Wasn't Sandringham a suspected Jacobite himself?
translation.es: ¿No se sospechaba que Sandringham era un jacobita?

translation.en: Aye. You know, I believe you're right.
And the duke died under very suspicious circumstances
translation.es: Y el duque murió bajo circunstancias muy sospechosas

translation.en: just before the battle of...
translation.es: justo antes de la batalla de...

translation.en: None of that, none of that!
Stand away before you do some permanent damage.
translation.es: Aléjense antes de causar más daños.

translation.en: I think we're getting somewhere at last.
translation.es: Creo que al fin estamos logrando algo.

translation.en: I'm really glad to hear it, but I think I shall take my leave.
translation.es: Me alegra mucho oírlo, pero creo que voy a irme.

translation.en: -So soon? -Yes.
I feel a bath is in order.
Aye, of course.
Well, I hope you will join us for Samhain tomorrow night.
translation.es: Espero que vengan mañana al festival de Samhain.

translation.en: What? The pagan festival?
Reverend Wakefield, you do astonish me.
I love a good ghost story as much as the next fellow.
translation.es: Me gusta una historia de fantasmas como a cualquiera.

translation.en: All right. Take your time, darling.
Do try to get home before the storm breaks. I will.
translation.es: -Vuelve a casa antes de la tormenta. -Lo haré.

translation.en: I'd never put any stock in superstition.
And my Catholicism was nominal at best.
translation.es: Mi catolicismo era, como mucho, nominal.

translation.en: However, I couldn't shake the feeling
translation.es: Sin embargo, no podía quitarme la sensación

translation.en: that Mrs. Graham's words had a ring of prophecy.
translation.es: de que las palabras de la Sra. Graham tenían algo de proféticas.

translation.en: The war had taught me to cherish the present
translation.es: La guerra me había enseñado a cuidar el presente

translation.en: because tomorrow might not ever come to pass.
translation.es: porque el mañana podía no llegar.

translation.en: But what I didn't know at the time
translation.es: Pero lo que no sabía entonces

translation.en: was that tomorrow would prove less important
translation.es: era que el mañana sería menos importante

translation.en: than yesterday.
Jesus H. Roosevelt Christ!
translation.es: ¡Por el amor de Dios y de Roosevelt!

translation.en: Excuse me, can I help you with something?
Frank, I was hoping to have the whole place lit up by the time you got back.
translation.es: Frank, esperaba iluminar todo antes de que llegaras.

translation.en: Darling, what's the matter?
Frank?
You look like you've seen a ghost.
I'm not at all sure that I haven't.
translation.es: No estoy seguro de no haberlo visto.

translation.en: When he pushed past me, he was close enough
translation.es: Cuando pasó a mi lado, estaba lo bastante cerca

translation.en: that I should have felt him brush my sleeve as he passed,
but I... I didn't.
And then I turned around to say something,
translation.es: Y cuando me di vuelta para decirle algo,

translation.en: and he had gone.
He just vanished.
That's when I
felt a chill down my spine.
translation.es: sentí un escalofrío en la espalda.

translation.en: Did you have many Scots in your charge during the war?
translation.es: ¿Tuviste a muchos escoceses a cargo durante la guerra?

translation.en: Yes, there was quite a few.
There was one in particular.
He was a piper in the Third Seaforths.
translation.es: Tocaba la gaita en el Tercer Regimiento.

translation.en: He couldn't stand being stuck with a needle.
It was...
All right.
What is it exactly, that,
you're asking me, Frank?
When I saw that chap staring up at you,
translation.es: Cuando vi que ese tipo te miraba

translation.en: I thought he might be someone you had nursed.
translation.es: pensé que podía ser alguien que hubieras cuidado.

translation.en: Someone who might be looking for you now
translation.es: Alguien que pudiera estar buscándote ahora

translation.en: to reconnect.
To "reconnect?"
It wouldn't be unusual.
I mean, it wouldn't be surprising if you had sought some...
translation.es: No me sorprendería si hubieras buscado algo de...

translation.en: Comfort, or...
Are you asking me if I've been unfaithful?
Is that what you think of me, Frank?
No, darling. No.
No. All I meant was that even if you had,
translation.es: No. Lo que quise decir es que si lo hubieras sido,

translation.en: it will make no difference to me. I love you.
translation.es: para mí no habría diferencia. Te amo.

translation.en: And nothing you could ever do could stop my loving you.
translation.es: Y no hay nada que puedas hacer para que deje de amarte.

translation.en: Forgive me.
Forgive me?
Of course.
Sex was our bridge back to one another.
translation.es: El sexo era el puente que nos unía.

translation.en: The one place where we always met.
translation.es: El único lugar donde siempre nos encontrábamos.

translation.en: Whatever obstacles presented themselves during the day or night,
translation.es: Cualquier obstáculo que se presentara durante el día o la noche,

translation.en: we could seek out and find each other again in bed.
translation.es: podíamos buscarnos y encontrarnos nuevamente en la cama.

translation.en: As long as we had that,
I had faith everything would work out.
translation.es: tenía fe en que todo saldría bien.

translation.en: That reminds me, I want to set an alarm.
translation.es: Eso me recuerda, quiero poner el despertador.

translation.en: I thought we weren't setting alarms on this trip.
translation.es: Pensé que no pondríamos el despertador en el viaje.

translation.en: I want to see the witches.
Must I ask?
Apparently, there's a circle of standing stones
translation.es: Parece que hay un círculo de piedras erguidas

translation.en: on a hill just outside the village,
translation.es: en una colina en las afueras del pueblo,

translation.en: and there's a local group who still observe rituals there.
translation.es: y hay un grupo del pueblo que realiza rituales allí.

translation.en: Well, they're not actually witches.
This lot are meant to be druids.
Sadly, I don't think there'll be a coven of devil-worshippers.
translation.es: No creo que haya un aquelarre de adoradores del diablo.

translation.en: Well, it's a pity.
Can't imagine anything I'd rather do.
translation.es: No puedo imaginar nada que me gustaría más.

translation.en: Liar.
Where will we be watching this spectacle?
A place called Craigh na Dun.
translation.es: En un lugar llamado Craigh na Dun.

translation.en: So, according to local folklore,
these stones were carried here from Africa
translation.es: estas piedras fueron traídas desde África

translation.en: by a race of Celtic giants.
translation.es: por una raza de gigantes celtas.

translation.en: I wasn't aware that Celts made a lot of trips to Africa.
translation.es: No sabía que los celtas hubieran viajado mucho a África.

translation.en: Only the giant ones.
Is that Inverness?
Yes, it must be.
Someone's coming.
Is that Mrs. Graham?
I think it is.
The Reverend's housekeeper is a witch.
translation.es: El ama de llaves del Reverendo es una bruja.

translation.en: Not a witch. Druid, remember?
translation.es: No es una bruja. Es una druida, ¿recuerdas?

translation.en: They should have been ridiculous,
and perhaps they were.
Parading in circles on top of a hill.
translation.es: Desfilando en círculos sobre una colina.

translation.en: But the hairs on the back of my neck prickled at the sight,
translation.es: Pero se me erizaron los cabellos de la nuca al verlos,

translation.en: and some small voice inside warned me
translation.es: y una voz dentro de mí me alertó

translation.en: I wasn't supposed to be here.
I was an unwelcome voyeur to something ancient and powerful.
translation.es: Era una espectadora indeseada de algo antiguo y poderoso.

translation.en: Wait for me!
I'm caught on something. I'll be there in a minute.
translation.es: Quedé atrapada en algo. Iré en un minuto.

translation.en: Claire, someone's coming.
We should go.
What have you got there?
I'm looking for that plant.
I think it's a forget-me-not, but I'm not sure.
translation.es: Creo que es una nomeolvides, pero no estoy segura.

translation.en: Why don't you pop back and get it?
I was considering it.
Would you care to go with me?
Darling, I'd love to,
but I've got an appointment with the Reverend.
translation.es: pero tengo una cita con el Reverendo.

translation.en: He found a box of materials last night.
translation.es: Encontró una caja con material anoche.

translation.en: Bills of sale from Black Jack's quartermaster.
translation.es: Recibos de la intendencia de Black Jack.

translation.en: That sounds terribly exciting.
Are you laughing at me?
Never.
-Shall I meet you for dinner later? -Yes.
-Love you. -Love you.
Come here.
Once, traveling at night,
I fell asleep in the passenger seat of a moving car,
translation.es: me quedé dormida en el asiento trasero de un auto,

translation.en: lulled by the noise and the motion into an illusion of serene weightlessness.
translation.es: arrullada por el ruido y el movimiento, con una ilusión de serena ingravidez.

translation.en: Then the driver took a bridge too fast.
translation.es: Luego el conductor tomó un puente muy rápido.

translation.en: And I woke to see the world spinning outside the car windows,
translation.es: Desperté y vi el mundo girar fuera de la ventanilla,

translation.en: and the sickening sensation of falling at high speed.
translation.es: con la horrible sensación de caer a gran velocidad.

translation.en: That is as close as I can come to describing what I experienced,
translation.es: Es lo más parecido que puedo describir a lo que experimenté,

translation.en: but it falls woefully short.
What?
When confronted with the impossible,
the rational mind will grope for the logical.
translation.es: la mente racional buscará una lógica.

translation.en: Perhaps I had stumbled onto the set of a cinema company
translation.es: Tal vez había tropezado con una compañía de cine

translation.en: filming a costume drama of some sort.
translation.es: que filmaba una película de época.

translation.en: But there was no logical reason
for actors to fire live ammunition.
translation.es: para que los actores dispararan de verdad.

translation.en: Frank?
What the devil are you doing?
You're not Frank.
No, madam. I am not.
Who the bloody hell are you?
I am Jonathan Randall Esquire,
translation.es: Soy el Capitán Jonathan Randall Esquire,

translation.en: Captain of His Majesty's Eighth Dragoons.
translation.es: del Octavo Regimiento de Dragones de Su Majestad.

translation.en: At your service.
Who are you?
My husband is expecting me.
He'll come looking for me if I'm not back in 10 minutes.
translation.es: Vendrá por mí si no regreso en 10 minutos.

translation.en: Your husband? What's his name?
What is his name?
-Frank. -Frank what?
Frank Beauchamp. He's a teacher.
Well, it's a pleasure to meet you, Mrs. Frank Beauchamp, a teacher's wife.
translation.es: Encantado de conocerla, Sra. Beauchamp, la esposa del maestro.

translation.en: You must think me the fool.
translation.es: Debe creer que soy un tonto.

translation.en: You'll be well advised to tell me exactly who you are
translation.es: Será mejor que me diga exactamente quién es

translation.en: and why you're here.
Madam, you'll find my patience is not infinite.
translation.es: Señora, mi paciencia no es infinita.

translation.en: Get off me, you bastard.
The speech of a lady.
The language of a whore.
I choose the whore.
Druid!
-What? -Druid!
Who are you?
Where are we going? Where are we go...
Over here!
You men over there! Quickly!
I wanted it to be a dream,
but I knew it wasn't.
translation.es: pero sabía que no lo era.

translation.en: If nothing else,
my erstwhile savior fairly reeked of odors
translation.es: mi salvador de otra época tenía olores

translation.en: too foul to be part of any dream I was likely to conjure up.
translation.es: demasiado nauseabundos para ser parte de cualquier sueño que pudiera tener.

translation.en: Let's have a look at you then, lass.
translation.es: Vamos a echarle una mirada, muchacha.

translation.en: I trust you're able to see me now?
What's your name?
I decided to continue using my maiden name.
translation.es: Decidí seguir usando mi nombre de soltera.

translation.en: If they intended to ransom me, I didn't want to lead them back to Frank.
translation.es: Si su intención era pedir rescate por mí, no quería guiarlos hasta Frank.

translation.en: That's right. And just what the hell do you think...
You said you found her?
Aye.
She was havin' words with a certain Captain of dragoons
translation.es: Estaba hablando con cierto Capitán de los Dragones

translation.en: with whom we are acquainted.
There seemed to be some question
as to whether the lady was or was not a whore.
translation.es: si la dama era o no una ramera.

translation.en: And what was the lady's position in this discussion?
translation.es: ¿Y cuál era la posición de la dama en esa discusión?

translation.en: I am not.
We could put her to the test.
I don't hold with rape.
translation.es: No estoy de acuerdo con la violación.

translation.en: And we've not the time for it, anyway.
translation.es: Y no tenemos tiempo para eso.

translation.en: Dougal, I've no idea what she might be or who,
translation.es: Dougal, no tengo idea de qué o quién es ella,

translation.en: but I'll stake my best shot she's not a whore.
translation.es: pero apostaría que no es una ramera.

translation.en: We'll puzzle it out later.
We've got a good distance to go tonight.
translation.es: Tenemos que recorrer gran distancia esta noche.

translation.en: And we must do something about Jamie first.
translation.es: Y debemos hacer algo antes con Jamie.

translation.en: Escape was my chief concern,
but I had no idea where I was.
And trying to find the road back to Inverness in the gathering darkness
translation.es: Y tratar de encontrar el camino a Inverness en la oscuridad

translation.en: felt like a fool's errand.
Out o' joint, poor bugger.
You can't ride with it like that, can you, lad?
Hurts bad enough sitting still.
I couldna manage a horse.
I don't mean to be leaving him behind.
There's no help for it, then.
translation.es: No hay nada que hacer, entonces.

translation.en: I'll have to force the joint back.
The wisest course of action would have been to keep my head down,
translation.es: Lo más inteligente hubiera sido mantener la cabeza gacha,

translation.en: my mouth shut,
and wait for the search parties Frank must have called out by now.
translation.es: y esperar a las partidas de búsqueda que Frank ya debía haber llamado.

translation.en: Here, lad.
Hold him.
Don't you dare!
Stand aside at once.
You'll break his arm if you do it like that.
translation.es: Si lo hacen así, le romperán el brazo.

translation.en: You have to get the bone of the upper arm in the correct position
translation.es: Hay que poner el hueso en la posición correcta

translation.en: before it slips back into joint.
translation.es: antes de deslizarlo en la articulación.

translation.en: Hold him steady.
This is the worst part.
It doesn't hurt anymore!
It will.
It will be tender for about a week.
You'll need a sling.
You, fetch me a long piece of cloth or a belt.
translation.es: Tráeme un trozo largo de tela o un cinturón.

translation.en: "Fetch me," she says. Do ye hear that, lads?
Give her yer belt.
I'm taking a guess you've done this before. I'm a nurse.
translation.es: -Supongo que ha hecho esto antes. -Soy enfermera.

translation.en: Not a wet nurse.
You mustn't move the joint for two or three days.
translation.es: No debe mover la articulación por dos o tres días.

translation.en: When you begin to use it again, go very slowly at first.
translation.es: Cuando empiece a moverla, hágalo muy lentamente.

translation.en: Stop at once if it hurts,
translation.es: Si le duele, deténgase de inmediato

translation.en: and use warm compresses on it daily.
translation.es: y use compresas calientes todos los días.

translation.en: All right, how does that feel?
Better. Thank ye.
Can you ride?
-Aye. -Good. We're leaving.
Where is it?
Where's the city? It should be visible from here.
translation.es: ¿Dónde está la ciudad? Debería verse desde aquí.

translation.en: Inverness?
You're looking straight at it.
There were no electric lights as far as the eye could see.
translation.es: No había luces eléctricas que pudieran verse.

translation.en: So, as much as my rational mind rebelled against the idea,
translation.es: A pesar de que mi mente racional se resistía a la idea,

translation.en: I knew in my heart I was no longer in the 20th century.
translation.es: sabía en mi corazón que ya no estaba en el siglo XX.

translation.en: Get yourself up.
You be sure to stay close to the rest of us.
And should ye try anythin' else, I shall slit your throat for you.
translation.es: Si trata de hacer algo más, le cortaré la garganta.

translation.en: Do you understand me?
Gimme your foot. Give it to me.
Careful!
What are you trying to do?
I'll get my plaid loose to cover ye.
You're shivering.
Thank you, but I'm fine, really.
You're shaking so hard, it's making my teeth rattle.
translation.es: Está temblando tanto que mis dientes castañetean.

translation.en: The plaid will keep us both warm,
translation.es: La capa nos mantendrá calientes a ambos,

translation.en: but I canna do it one-handed.
translation.es: pero no puedo hacerlo con una mano.

translation.en: Can ye reach?
We don't want you to freeze before sun-up.
translation.es: Así no se congelará antes del amanecer.

translation.en: Sun-up?
You mean we'll be riding all night?
All night,
and the next one, too, I reckon.
translation.es: y la noche siguiente también, creo.

translation.en: Fine time of year for a ride, though.
translation.es: Es buena época del año para viajar.

translation.en: Druid.
You see up there?
I know this place.
Been through here before, have ye?
Yes.
The 17th and 18th centuries,
translation.es: En los siglos XVII y XVIII

translation.en: you'd have often found a British Army patrol up there.
translation.es: a menudo se encontraban patrullas británicas aquí.

translation.en: I recognize that rock.
The one that looks like a cock's tail.
translation.es: La que parece la cola de un gallo.

translation.en: It has a name.
Cocknammon Rock.
The English, they used it for ambushes!
translation.es: Los ingleses la usan para hacer emboscadas.

translation.en: They could be lying in wait right now.
It's a bonnie place for an ambush, right enough.
translation.es: Es un buen lugar para una emboscada.

translation.en: Dougal. Dougal.
Now, you'll be telling me exactly how and why
translation.es: Va a decirme exactamente cómo y por qué

translation.en: you come to know there's an ambush up ahead.
translation.es: sabe que hay una emboscada allá adelante.

translation.en: I don't know,
but I heard the redcoats use Cocknammon...
translation.es: pero oí que los Casacas Rojas usan la Roca...

translation.en: Where did you hear?
In the village.
Hide yourself!
Lost yer way?
Hope you haven't been misusing that shoulder.
translation.es: Espero que no haya esforzado ese hombro.

translation.en: You're hurt!
This lot isn't my blood.
Not much of it anyway.
Dougal and the others will be waiting further up the stream.
translation.es: Dougal y los otros nos esperan más allá, arroyo arriba.

translation.en: We should go.
-I'm not going with you! -Yes, you are.
What? Are you going to cut my throat if I don't?
translation.es: ¿Va a cortarme la garganta si no lo hago?

translation.en: Why, no?
But...
You don't look that heavy.
Now if ye won't walk,
I shall pick you up and throw you over my shoulder.
translation.es: la levantaré y la llevaré sobre el hombro.

translation.en: Do ye want me to do that?
No!
Well, then,
I suppose that means you're coming with me.
Serves you right.
Probably torn muscles as well as bruising.
translation.es: Un desgarro en el músculo además de moretones.

translation.en: Well, it wasn't much of a choice.
If I'd not moved my shoulder,
translation.es: Si no hubiera movido el hombro,

translation.en: I'd never have moved anything else ever again.
I can handle a single redcoat with one hand,
translation.es: Puedo pelear con un Casaca Roja con una mano,

translation.en: maybe even two.
But not three.
Besides, ye can fix it for me again
translation.es: Además, usted puede volver a arreglarlo

translation.en: when we get to where we're going.
That's what you think.
You have. Here's to you, lass.
For tipping us to the villains in the rocks and giving us a wee bit o' fun!
translation.es: Por mostrarnos a los villanos en la rocas y darnos un poco de diversión.

translation.en: Have a wee nip.
It willna fill your belly, but it will make ye forget you're hungry.
translation.es: No le llenará la panza, pero le hará olvidar el hambre.

translation.en: Stop!
Help! He's going over!
Help me get him up!
Come on.
Take it easy.
Easy now.
Gunshot wound.
The idiot could've said something.
translation.es: El idiota pudo haber dicho algo.

translation.en: It's a clean exit.
I think the round's gone straight through the muscle.
translation.es: Creo que la bala pasó a través del músculo.

translation.en: I don't think it's serious, but he's lost a lot of blood.
translation.es: No creo que sea grave, pero perdió mucha sangre.

translation.en: It'll need to be disinfected before I can dress it properly.
Disinfect?
Yes, it must be cleaned of dirt
to protect it from germs.
Germs?
Just get me some iodine.
Merthiolate?
Alcohol?
Here you go.
Welcome back.
I'm all right, just a wee bit dizzy.
translation.es: Estoy bien, solo un poco mareado.

translation.en: You are not all right.
Didn't you tell how badly you were bleeding?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no dijo cuánto estaba sangrando?

translation.en: You're lucky you're not dead,
translation.es: Tiene suerte de no estar muerto,

translation.en: brawling and fighting and throwing yourself off horses.
translation.es: después de luchar y arrojarse del caballo.

translation.en: All right, I need a sterile bandage
and some clean cloth.
Jesus H. Roosevelt Christ.
translation.es: Por el amor de Dios y de Roosevelt.

translation.en: Hold still.
Easy.
Lift him up.
Come on, you goddamn bloody bastard.
I've never heard a woman use such language in my life.
translation.es: Nunca en mi vida escuché a una mujer usar ese lenguaje.

translation.en: Your husband should tan your hide for ye, woman.
translation.es: Su esposo debería zurrarle el trasero, mujer.

translation.en: St. Paul says, "Let a woman be silent, and..."
translation.es: San Pablo dijo: "Que la mujer sea silenciosa..."

translation.en: You can mind your own bloody business and so can St. Paul!
translation.es: Pueden meterse en sus asuntos, usted y San Pablo.

translation.en: And if you move so much as a single muscle
translation.es: Y si mueve un solo músculo

translation.en: while I'm tying this bandage,
I'll bloody throttle you.
Threats, is it?
And after I shared my drink with ye.
translation.es: Después de que compartimos la bebida.

translation.en: We have 15 miles to go yet.
Five hours, at the least, if not seven.
translation.es: Cinco horas, como mínimo, o siete.

translation.en: We'll stay long enough for ye to stem the bleeding and dress his wound.
translation.es: Nos quedaremos hasta que deje de sangrar y lo vende.

translation.en: No more than that.
He needs rest.
-Did you hear me? -Randall...
The officer ye encountered,
he won't give up so easily.
translation.es: no se dará por vencido fácilmente.

translation.en: He commands the redcoats hereabouts
translation.es: Dirige a los Casacas Rojas por aquí

translation.en: and he's sent patrols out in every direction by now.
translation.es: y ya debe haber enviado patrullas en todas las direcciones.

translation.en: We canna stay here long.
You know Randall?
Black Jack Randall, that is?
Aye.
I won't risk you or anyone else being taken prisoner by that man.
translation.es: No me arriesgaría a que la tomara prisionera, a usted o a ninguno otro.

translation.en: If ye canna fix me up well enough to ride,
translation.es: Si no puede arreglarme lo suficiente como para cabalgar,

translation.en: you'll be leaving me here with a loaded pistol
translation.es: déjenme aquí con una pistola cargada,

translation.en: so I may determine my own fate.
translation.es: para poder decidir mi propio destino.

translation.en: You might've well told me you were shot
translation.es: Podría haberme dicho que estaba herido

translation.en: before you fell off the horse.
Didn't hurt much at the time.
Does it hurt now?
Aye.
Good.
That's about all I can do.
translation.es: Eso es todo lo que puedo hacer.

translation.en: The rest is up to you.
Thank you, Sassenach.
Truly.
All right, on your horse, soldier.
Castle Leoch.
I'd been here with Frank two days ago.
translation.es: Había estado aquí con Frank dos días antes.

translation.en: Or was that in the future?
How could I remember something that hadn't happened yet?
translation.es: ¿Cómo podía recordar algo que todavía no había pasado?

translation.en: So far, I'd been assaulted,
threatened, kidnapped and nearly raped.
And somehow, I knew that my journey had only just begun.
translation.es: Y, sin embargo, sabía que mi viaje apenas había comenzado.
